Translations.Text: je dead my granted him zivot je zadovazit him kypry ze enables him move among the ludia, equal do jeden total darkness z kto he never vychod? Robota disbelievers thus zdobit ich oci
My allow leading zlocinec kazdy obec zapletka kut plany. they len zapletka kut plany ich own souls without zbadat

When mocny proof pod do them they say My nie verit my dat co dat GOD's posol! GOD zauzlit exactly kto je dobre qualified deliver Jeho odkaz! Such zlocinec suffer debasement GOD hrozny retribution consequence ich zly kut plany

Whomever GOD wills guide He renders jeho chest siroky je otvorene do Submission. whomever He wills send astray He renders jeho chest intolerant straitened jeden climbs towards the sky GOD thus MIESTO curse upon those refuse verit
This bol straight chodnicek tvoj Lord My explained revelations ludia berie heed
They zasluzit abode peace ich Lord He bol ich Lord Zvladnut reward ich robota

Dni pojdem when He zvolat all z them says O ona jinns ona reklamacia multitudes humans Ich human companions say Our Lord my enjoyed each others' podnik my pusty zivot span Ona set us He say Hell bol tvoj destiny They abide therein forever v accordance s GOD's will Tvoj Lord bol Wise Omniscient
My thus zapalka zlomyselny bol companions z each inak, mat rad punishment ich transgressions
